properties.name: A door closes on the down beat
properties.description: Posted by Matthewdavidnew philadelphia, ohioShe and I at the top of the stairs, the door closes on the down beat of Jack Black\'s version of "Lets get it on"

properties.name: A kiss before a blizzard
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidWe kissed good-bye, as a bell chimed five, before travelling through a snow storm to our seperate cities.

properties.name: A party is a party, I guess
properties.description: Posted by Matthewdavid You never did make it to a party early enough to hear my set. I am still far too jealeous of your dancing skills. 2000

properties.name: Bells begin to ring
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidThe beginging of bells ringing at just the right momentThe first time that a bell would ring at just the right moment

properties.name: Craig, Michael and Christa
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidNew Philadelphia, ohioTwo best friends and the girl I held hands with in the back row of kindergarden story time. 1979

properties.name: Just out of the darkroom at work
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidOne of our customers came in and told us about the attacks, I had no idea what was really happening until after work when I could make it to a television. I tought he was joking at first and still feel remorseful that I didn\'t know at the time that the world was changing.

properties.name: Just the waves
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidJust the WavesDuring my first and craziest semester of college I would walk out onto the breakwall and watch the whole city and hear nothing but the waves

properties.name: Mo Racca?
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidCanton, OhioI am glad that I did not bother you until we were on the decent into La Guardia. 2003

properties.name: New Philadelphia Public Skatepark
properties.description: Posted by Matthewdavid new philadelphia, ohio

properties.name: Sorry about the door
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidAfter hitting her in the head with the car door by accident, we danced on the sidewalk to Frank Sinatra playing throught the open windows

properties.name: Sunday night under my pillow
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidSunday night with a transister radio shaped like the words Radio Shack turned up just enough to make it through my pillow, America\'s Top 40.

properties.name: Thanks Mom for the encouragement
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidSiouxsie Sioux and the BansheesWhy did my mom have to talk me into meeting you? It is so emberacing now having been so star struck then. 1991

properties.name: Titles of songs I can't remember
properties.description: Posted by Matthewdavidpeninsula, ohioMagnolia is a lovely name for a girl that you could meet on a ski lift. How did we ever start singing so loudly?

properties.name: Where Do I Begin?
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidAs I roll over the top of some foothill, The Chemical Brother\'s "Where Do I Begin" hits it peak, and the Rocky Mountains rise up out of the horizon for the first time in my life.

properties.name: Why did I tell you I was older than I was?
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidChicago, ilI met a girl here that I kept in touch with for a few years. I think the weight of my lies caused the whole thing to clolapse in the end. 1990

properties.name: little fluffy clouds in big sky country
properties.description: Posted by MatthewdavidA summer with my brother and the Orb. Not to mention Messiah\'s "Temple of Dreams" with the Running Man movie samples. 1994
